caption:
This photograph depicts a marine scene at a fishing pier. In the foreground, there is a cluttered wooden dock strewn with various fishing gear and marine supplies. The focus includes several open boxes: one is filled with fish, suggesting recent fishing activity, while others appear to be empty or hold other materials. Also visible are a red coiled hose, some scattered metal fittings, and parts of what appear to be marine machinery.

In the center and extending to the background, the dock leads to a body of water where a fishing boat named "CITY BOY" is moored. The boat, primarily white with red trim, is docked alongside a wooden pier, which has a building with a gabled roof at its end. 

The overall scene captures the everyday working environment of a fishing pier, highlighting aspects of commercial fishing with a focus on the equipment and boats used. The setting appears calm, with overcast skies and still water reflecting elements of the dock and boat.
title: Seafood processing plant
